titles.title: To provide for the reliquidation of certain entries.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/27/2005--Introduced. Directs the Bureau of Customs and Border Protection to: (1) reliquidate certain entries of candles without assessment of antidumping duties and interest; and (2) refund any amounts owed.
